name: Preakness 2024
summary: The upcoming 2024 Preakness Stakes is shaping up to be an exciting event. Seize the Grey emerged victorious in the muddy race, crushing Mystik Dan's hopes of a Triple Crown. CBS Sports provides expert insights on the horses, futures, odds, and dates for the Preakness Stakes, including picks from an expert who accurately predicted last year's superfecta. NBC Washington offers comprehensive information about the race, while NBC New York highlights Mystik Dan's quest for a second Triple Crown win and discusses the race's start time. WBAL TV Baltimore provides a summary of the race and highlights key aspects. The updated field and post positions are available on NBC Washington, along with news of a scratched race favorite. CBS Sports also shares expert picks and race details.

name: Dallas Stars
summary: The Dallas Stars have taken a commanding lead over the Colorado Avalanche in the second round of the Stanley Cup Playoffs, winning Game 4 in a intense match and Game 5 in a decisive 5-1 victory. The two teams went into double overtime in Game 6, with the Stars ultimately eliminating the Avalanche and advancing to the Western Conference Final. Fans can watch the upcoming Game 5 live on ESPN and CBS News, or follow online for updates and highlights. The Stars have proven their dominance on the road, winning Game 3 in Colorado and putting themselves in a strong position to close out the series in Game 4. Experts are analyzing the key players and performances of both teams, highlighting both the strengths and weaknesses of each squad. As the series continues, the Stars aim to secure their victory while the Avalanche fight to stay alive in the playoffs.

name: Bundesliga
summary: Bundesliga headlines include Leverkusen's historic undefeated season, with Grimaldo named Player of the Month. Bayern Munich fell to Hoffenheim, while Magnus Carlsen joins the Bundesliga. Leverkusen extended their unbeaten run to 50 games with a win over Bochum. Bayern's Thomas Müller reached a milestone, and St Pauli's promotion success combines with leftist principles. Fantasy Team of the Week selections are also noted.

name: Alice Stewart
summary: Political commentator Alice Stewart, who frequently appeared on CNN, has passed away at the age of 58. Stewart was also a Republican adviser and a senior board member of the Harvard Institute of Politics. Her sudden death has shocked and saddened her colleagues, who have expressed their condolences on social media and in tributes.

name: Colorado Avalanche
summary: The Colorado Avalanche face adversity after Valeri Nichushkin's six-month suspension, announced just before their playoff loss. Despite this setback, they attempt to regroup and forge ahead. The Avalanche lost Game 3 of their playoff series due to the Stars' strong defense. Upcoming games will be televised on ESPN. The team now faces questions about their shortcomings and future prospects. Meanwhile, injured player Jonathan Drouin returns in Game 4, filling the void left by Nichushkin's absence.

name: F1
summary: Formula 1 is reportedly considering bringing a Grand Prix to Chicago. Meanwhile, rumors indicate Kevin Magnussen's tactics at Haas may lead to a potential race ban. F1 fans can test their knowledge with a quiz on recent events and Imola's history. The 2024 F1 Emilia Romagna Grand Prix in Imola can be streamed or watched on cable, with experts providing predictions and tips. Practice sessions for the Grand Prix provided insights into the track's unique characteristics. The Imola circuit has a rich history involving both tragedy and triumph. Williams has extended Alexander Albon's contract, while Red Bull has unveiled significant upgrades for the Imola F1 race.

name: Josh Hart
summary: The New York Knicks suffered a setback in Game 6 when Josh Hart exited due to abdominal soreness. Despite the injury, Hart is expected to play through the pain in Game 7, leaving him questionable for the crucial matchup. The team remains hopeful that he can contribute despite the strain. Meanwhile, Hart has been outspoken, criticizing "idiotic" criticism aimed at the Knicks' head coach and calling out "ignorance" for blaming injuries on the coaching staff. Hart's teammates believe he will make a difference in Game 7, although he acknowledges that he is the one responsible for the Knicks' poor effort in Game 4. Despite his injury and the team's struggles, Hart remains determined to help the Knicks advance to the next round.

name: Indy 500 qualifying
summary: Indy 500 qualifying will take place over two days, with pole position being determined on Saturday, May 18, 2024. Kyle Larson has shown impressive speed during practice sessions. The qualifying format includes a two-day system, with drivers attempting to qualify for the race on both Saturday and Sunday. The schedule, how to watch, and format of qualifying are outlined in various news articles. Kyle Larson locked into the field during Saturday's qualifying, while Rinus Veekay recovered from a crash to secure a top 12 position. Larson rebounded on his second qualifying run, while NBC and Peacock will provide coverage of the pole qualifying this weekend.

name: RCB vs CSK
summary: The upcoming match between Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB) and Chennai Super Kings (CSK) is crucial for both teams' chances of qualifying for the playoffs in the ongoing IPL 2024. According to experts, the match is a virtual knockout, with both teams needing a win to keep their hopes alive. However, rain threatens to disrupt the game, potentially eliminating RCB from contention if it results in a no-result. Meanwhile, social media is abuzz with fans expressing their support for either side, with some even suspecting former cricketer Gautam Gambhir of using a fake account to voice his opinion. Despite the uncertainty surrounding the weather, the atmosphere is electric as fans eagerly await a thrilling encounter between two of the most iconic teams in the league.

name: Rudy Giuliani
summary: Rudy Giuliani has faced legal challenges recently. He has not yet been served with an indictment in Arizona, despite attempts by officials. At his 80th birthday party, he was served with papers related to an investigation into fake electors. WABC Radio has suspended Giuliani for discussing false election claims. Furthermore, a bankruptcy judge has expressed frustration with Giuliani's case and rejected an attempt to challenge a $148 million judgment. Giuliani was also served with an indictment in Arizona on the same day as his birthday party. Despite these developments, Giuliani has continued to face difficulties in being served with the Arizona indictment.

name: Armed Forces Day 2024
summary: May is Armed Forces Day, a time to honor and celebrate the brave men and women who serve or have served in the United States Armed Forces. Various organizations, including OEM, Sokolove Law, and the City of Norfolk, are hosting events to show their appreciation. MLB will also be observing Armed Forces Day and Memorial Day 2024. Cities like Torrance and Lawton will be holding parades and celebrations. The American Legion is offering discounts to military members during Military Appreciation Month. The public is welcome to attend JBLM's Armed Forces Day event on May 18th. The VA is hosting a variety of events throughout the week to honor veterans.

name: Shane Lowry
summary: Shane Lowry made history at the 2024 PGA Championship by shooting a record-breaking 29 on the front nine and tying the lowest score in major history with a 62 in the third round. His impressive performance propelled him up the leaderboard, putting him back in contention for the title. Despite Scottie Scheffler's struggles, Lowry's exceptional play tied men's major records for the lowest round and score to par. Lowry's third shot on the 6th hole in Round 3 further showcased his remarkable talent. With his historic performance, Lowry has solidified his place among the elite golfers in the world.

name: Boxing
summary: Tyson Fury and Oleksandr Usyk's highly anticipated boxing match has received significant coverage. Experts predict Usyk's victory by split decision, while others speculate on the odds and best bets. In a separate development, Darren Till has entered the boxing arena with a scheduled fight against Julio Cesar Chavez Jr. However, a boxing announcer faced backlash for mistakenly declaring the wrong winner in a bout, leading to his resignation. Undisputed Boxing, a video game featuring boxing, has announced its release date and cover athletes. Fans can now access the Fury vs. Usyk pay-per-view livestream online. Boxing's popularity in video games is explored in light of the Fury vs. Usyk match. Tulare boxer Richard Torrez Jr. is preparing for his ESPN fight against Brandon Moore. Additionally, Tanzanian boxer Nyika's motivations extend beyond winning as he fights for a greater purpose.

name: Las Vegas Aces
summary: The Las Vegas Aces, a WNBA franchise, are receiving a $100,000 sponsorship for each active player from the Las Vegas tourism authority. This sponsorship has been met with positive reactions, including the signing of former Iowa basketball star Kate Martin to the Aces roster. The team has also revealed its 2023 WNBA Championship rings, celebrating their back-to-back titles. Additionally, 15 out of 20 Aces home games for the 2024 season have already been sold out, indicating strong fan support. The WNBA is currently investigating the legality of the sponsorship, which has garnered significant attention in the sports and entertainment industries.

name: Tyson Fury
summary: In a highly anticipated boxing match, Oleksandr Usyk emerged victorious over Tyson Fury via a split decision. Usyk, who remained undefeated, became the undisputed heavyweight champion by claiming all four major heavyweight titles. Despite a valiant effort from Fury, Usyk's skillful footwork and technical prowess proved to be the deciding factors in the close contest. The fight highlights showcase the intense exchanges and tactical battles between the two heavyweights.

name: Diddy
summary: Several news sources have reported on the release of a surveillance video from 2016 that allegedly shows Sean "Diddy" Combs physically assaulting his ex-girlfriend, Cassie Ventura. The video, obtained by CNN, has sparked reactions from various media outlets and the Los Angeles District Attorney. Details of the incident, including the extent of the alleged assault, are currently under investigation by authorities. It is important to note that the investigation is ongoing, and no charges have been filed against Combs at this time.

name: Scottie Scheffler police
summary: Professional golfer Scottie Scheffler was arrested on suspicion of assault after an alleged incident with a police officer following the first round of the PGA Championship on Friday. Despite his arrest, Scheffler returned to compete in the tournament. According to the Louisville Mayor, there is no body camera footage of the incident; however, police reports indicate that the officer involved was transported to the hospital. It is unclear whether Scheffler was charged and released or remains in custody. The investigation into the matter is ongoing.

name: Marjorie Taylor Greene
summary: A House Oversight Committee hearing descended into chaos as Republican Marjorie Taylor Greene clashed with Democratic Representatives Ocasio-Cortez and Jasmine Crockett. Greene's comments mocking Crockett's appearance led to personal insults and a tense atmosphere. The hearing also saw accusations of drinking in the Capitol and a physical altercation between Greene and Boebert. The incident has raised questions about Greene's future in Congress and the level of decorum in political discourse.
